thread.title: David French on NPR: Trump’s executive order roll out was flawed but it’s actually moderate – the reaction is overblown
thread.title_full: David French on NPR: Trump’s executive order roll out was flawed but it’s actually moderate – the reaction is overblown

author: Nancy French
title: David French on NPR: Trump’s executive order roll out was flawed but it’s actually moderate – the reaction is overblown
text:
Embed from Getty Images 
David’s article on National Review called “ Trump’s Executive Order on Refugees — Separating Fact from Hysteria ” has gone super viral, and he’ll be doing some press on it over the next couple of days. After church this afternoon, he was interviewed on NPR to get his quick take, which I’ve embedded below: 
Additionally, he’ll on on NPR’s On Point tomorrow from 9 to 10 Central, for a lengthier discussion on the controversial move.
